Package ui.input

Interface ResizeHandler

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    BasicSectionComposer, CentredSection, DrawableResponsiveSection, Filler, LabeledMenuItem, MenuButton, MinimumSize, MinimumSize.MinimumSizeDialog, MinimumSizeSection, NoOverlapSectionComposer, Player.ConfigButton, ResponsiveBorderSection, SelectableCentredSection, SelectableMinimumSizeSection, SelectableResponsiveBorderedSection
    public interface ResizeHandler
    Handles when the user resizes the terminal window.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method Description
      void resize​(int width, int height)
      Processes the new terminal window size.

    • Method Detail

      • resize

        void resize​(int width,
            int height)
        Processes the new terminal window size.
        Parameters:
        width - The new width in characters.
        height - The new height in characters.
